description: This Dart file defines the OtpRepository class responsible for handling OTP request and verification operations within the authentication module of a secure video call platform frontend. It interacts with an external AuthApi and manages token storage via shared preferences.

classes.name: OtpRepository
classes.description: Repository class for handling OTP-related API calls and local token storage

methods.name: requestOtp
methods.description: Sends a request to generate an OTP for the specified phone number via the AuthApi

methods.name: verifyOtp
methods.description: Verifies the OTP for the given phone number, retrieves an auth token upon success, stores it locally, and updates application state
